item.title: Proximity Sense AR
item.description: Experience the world in a whole new way with Proximity Sense AR!Our innovative app uses augmented reality technology to sense the distance to objects around you and translate that information into a pattern of vibrations. Simply point your phone in front of you and let the vibrations guide youâ€¦
